name: medical-terminologies-mcp
description: MCP Server that unifies access to major global medical terminologies through a standardized interface
author: Sidney Bissoli

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --tree-shaking=false --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
